title: Configure M-Pesa owner payment number (0701599601) and display it in deposit instructions

requirements.text: Persist an owner-configurable M-Pesa payment destination number in the backend and expose a query for the frontend to read it.

quotes: yes my number 0701599601  mode of payment M-pesa

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores an M-Pesa destination number value that can be used as the appâ€™s deposit destination.
Backend provides a public query method that returns the current M-Pesa destination number for display in the UI.
The stored destination number is initialized to exactly "0701599601".

requirements.text: Update the wallet deposit M-Pesa instructions UI to display the configured destination number "0701599601" (from the backend query) in clear English, while keeping the flow manual (no M-Pesa API integration).

quotes: yes my number 0701599601  mode of payment M-pesa

acceptanceCriteria: On the Wallet deposit form when M-Pesa is selected, the instructions explicitly show the destination number "0701599601" as the number users should send funds to.
The destination number displayed in the instructions is fetched from the backend (not hardcoded in the component).
All user-facing instruction text is in English and continues to state that deposits are manually reviewed/approved.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not add any direct M-Pesa API integration; keep the payment flow manual with admin review.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Implementing automatic M-Pesa STK push, callbacks, or real-time payment verification.
Changing the existing deposit request fields captured from the user (phone number and transaction code) beyond what is necessary to display the owner destination number.
